contest.step_1_description: Start by providing the essential details for your competition.
contest.step_2_description: Specify the rules, discipline, and other organizational details.
contest.step_3_description: Add competitors who will participate in the contest.
contest.step_4_description: Please review the competition details below before creating it.
contest.no_competitors_message: No competitors added yet. Add at least one to continue.
contest.notes_placeholder: Any additional details about the competition...

steps.basic_hint: Tell us when and where the contest will take place.
steps.details_hint: Provide organizer info and optional notes.
steps.competitors_hint: Optionally pre-register lifters to speed up meet day.
steps.attempts_hint: Configure opening attempts for each competitor.

attempts.empty: Add at least one competitor to set opening attempts.

messages.events_hint: Discipline is derived automatically from the selected events.

validation.warning: Please complete the required fields before continuing.

validation.name_min_length: Contest name must be at least 3 characters
validation.name_too_short: Contest name must be at least 2 characters
validation.date_past: Contest date cannot be in the past
validation.rack_height_validation: Rack height must be between 1 and 20
validation.location_min_length: Location must be at least 2 characters
validation.bar_weight_positive: Bar weight must be greater than 0 kg
validation.bar_weight_increment: Bar weight must be in 0.25 kg increments
validation.bar_weight_help: Standard bar weights: 20kg (men), 15kg (women). Must be in 0.25kg increments.
validation.plate_weight_increment: Plate weight must be in 0.25 kg increments

competitor.delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This will remove all their attempts and results from the contest.
competitor.validation_error: Please fill in all required fields

competitor.photo_modal_instructions: Press ESC or click outside to close

results.no_results_available: No results available. Click "Calculate Results" to generate rankings.
results.select_contest_to_view: Select a contest to view results.

backup.title: Database Backup & Restore
backup.subtitle: Manage your competition data backups. Create backups before important operations and restore from previous versions if needed.
backup.no_backups_description: Create your first backup to protect your competition data.
backup.confirm_restore_title: Are you sure you want to restore from this backup?
backup.confirm_restore_warning: This will replace your current data!
backup.confirm_restore_safety: A safety backup of your current data will be created automatically.

plates.title: Plate Inventory
plates.description: Manage available plates for this competition
plates.affects_calculations: Used for minimum increment and maximum weight

system.title: System Status
system.subtitle: Application health monitoring and recovery
system.not_operational_desc: Some features may not work correctly. Please try the recovery actions below.
system.continue_desc: The system is operational. You can continue using the application normally.

help.before_competitions: Before competitions: Create a backup before starting any competition
help.regular_backups: Regular backups: Create backups after major data entry sessions
help.safe_restore: Safe restore: The app automatically creates a safety backup before restoring
help.after_restore: After restore: Restart the application for best results

metric_descriptions.overall: Sum of coefficient points from the top four men and top woman registered to each club.
